xmlText.p: First Period_1, Calgary, Tkachuk 15 (Brouwer, Backlund), 1:32. 2, Calgary, Giordano 9 (Hamilton), 14:21. Penalties_Khaira, EDM, (holding), 4:24; Stajan, CGY, (holding), 11:42; Kassian, EDM, Misconduct (misconduct), 14:43; Nurse, EDM, (unsportsmanlike conduct), 19:00; Hathaway, CGY, (unsportsmanlike conduct), 19:00.

Second Period_3, Edmonton, Davidson 1 (Puljujarvi, Strome), 13:50. 4, Edmonton, Kassian 4 (Draisaitl, McDavid), 14:54. Penalties_Backlund, CGY, (holding), 0:22; Cammalleri, EDM, (hooking), 10:30; Hathaway, CGY, (high sticking), 17:00; Talbot, EDM, served by Puljujarvi, (delay of game), 18:36.

Third Period_5, Edmonton, Davidson 2 (Strome), 5:16. 6, Calgary, Tkachuk 16 (Backlund), 7:50. Penalties_Kassian, EDM, Major (fighting), 1:53; Lomberg, CGY, Major (fighting), 1:53; Kassian, EDM, served by Puljujarvi, (unsportsmanlike conduct), 1:53; Kassian, EDM, Misconduct (misconduct), 1:53; Kassian, EDM, Misconduct (misconduct), 1:53.
Overtime_None. Penalties_Rittich, CGY, served by Hathaway, Misconduct (misconduct), 1:16.
Shootout_Calgary 1 (Ferland NG, Tkachuk G, Monahan NG), Edmonton 2 (Cammalleri G, Draisaitl NG, McDavid G, ).
Goalies_Calgary, Rittich 4-1-2 (37 shots-34 saves). Edmonton, Talbot 18-17-2 (37-34).
Referees_Steve Kozari, Kendrick Nicholson. Linesmen_Ryan Daisy, Steve Miller.
